data.text: @JamaicaObserver @christufton A lot went wrong, some reflection need to be done, to make it better the next time and what is left of the virus in the different communities.

@JamaicaObserver @christufton Guys, have you taken a look at New Zealand civid 19 situation in recent times? This was a country which all along was being praised for their pandemic management. Now, they are being overwhelmed by omicron. We have to come to realize that absolutely nobody got it right always.
@forthelackof @JamaicaObserver @christufton Are they supposed to compensate people who were sick from the virus? Why?
@JamaicaObserver @christufton @christufton come here for a min Sir. You and I know very well you wanted to include your Boss as the novelty to allow Jamaica to cuss you out. Talk chute man.
@JamaicaObserver @christufton Smart to to identify his errors so that people won't use it against him in the future smart but still need to go Mr. Segregation aka Mr. Apatheid.

@JamaicaObserver @christufton But bigger question is why does this Gov’t continue with apartheid DRMA with arrests being made for “illegal” parties held outside hotels & in upscale areas where cops turn a blind eye?
@JamaicaObserver @christufton So they are now distributing #N95/FFP2 masks, the only masks that significantly block #Omicron & #Ba2 ?

@JamaicaObserver @christufton The JLP govt disrespected the nation while having us on lockdown they had tourists & foreigners Frolicking around the island (on a party weekend) & then denied knowing about it while (Jamaica tourist Board) was promoting it on their website (but the govt was unaware of MOCHAFEST)
@JamaicaObserver @christufton And the July that the PM wanted to celebrate his family birthdays and anniversary
